text: Je akasace daravaje aheta ani musacya upasya (isvara) la dokavuna pahave ani majhi tara purna khatri ahe ki to khotarada ahe ani asa prakare phira'aunaci va'ita krtye tyacya najareta bhali cangali dakhavili gelita ani tyala sanmargapasuna rokhale gele ani phiraunace (pratyeka) kata-karasthana vinasataca rahile
